article: How many  _  of Chinese food do you know? I'd like  to tell  you some specials.  _  1 is noodles. There are many kinds of noodles in China, like rolled noodles, pulled noodles, knife-cut noodles and fried noodles. All of them  _  great. Special 2 is  _  Dumplings, yes, I think you must know  _  . Do you know the famous cartoon movie? There are  _  kinds of Chinese specials in the movie: noodles and fried dumplings.  _  we also have another dumplings--boiled dumplings. We often eat boiled dumplings  _  our Spring Festival. I like Chinese food very much. I hope you  _  like it.
